mediaDisplay.text:
You can find movies on your media player by browsing through your DVDs and videos or by searching for a movie by its filename.
1. Press "Menu" on the remote to display the main menu. 2. Use the arrow keys on the remote to highlight "Movies" in the menu and press "OK" on the remote to display the Movies screen. The Movies screen displays the movies available on the media player. 3. Use the arrow keys on the remote to browse through your movies and select a movie. - OR - 4. Press "Menu" again to display the Movies menu. 5. Select "Search" in the Movies menu and press "OK" on the remote to open the Search Movies screen and look for a specific movie. 6. On the Search Movies screen, use the on-screen keyboard and the remote to enter the name of a movie title. 7. When you’ve found the movie you want to play, press the Play button on the remote.
